description:
Personal No.

Male born in Korea on 1900-1999 starts 1xxxxxx

Male born in Korea on 2000-now starts 3xxxxxx

Female born in Korea on 1900-1999 starts 2xxxxxx

Female born in Korea on 2000-now starts 4xxxxxx

Male born not in Korea but Korean on 1900-1999 starts 5xxxxxx

Male born not in Korea but Korean on 2000-now starts 7xxxxxx

Female born not in Korea but Korean on 1900-1999 starts 6xxxxxx

Female born not in Korea but Korean on 2000-now starts 8xxxxxx
name: South Korea Passport

description:
USA Passport Online Generator

 

You can create high quality USA Passport without Photoshop and PSD templates in 2 minutes. Enter data in all fields, upload your photo and signature, and click Generate button.

 

Validation

After you have created a document, you should definitely check it with scanners. We recommend using Regula.
name: USA Passport

description:

1 - Bank Of America

If the desired bank is not in the list, you can enter its name in the "Bank" field.
